    • Method Detail

      • attach

        public static void attach(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                          Notifications notifications)
        Attaches the provided Notifications to the attributes of the provided request using the key 'notifications'.
        Parameters:
        request - The request to attach the provided Notifications to.
        notifications - The Notifications to attach.

      • getNotifications

        public static Notifications getNotifications(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Returns the instance of Notifications of the user sending the provided request. Returns a new instance of Notifications if the user has no Notifications instance in their session.
        Parameters:
        request - The request from which to return the Notifications.
        Returns:
        The reused or new instance of Notifications.

      • formatPrice

        public static java.lang.String formatPrice(java.lang.Integer priceInCents)
        Formats the provided price in cents to dollars using a period as the decimal separator.
        Parameters:
        priceInCents - The price in cents.
        Returns:
        The price in dollars.

      • referer

        public static java.lang.String referer(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                       java.lang.String or)
        Returns the referer location of the provided request. If the provided request has no referer, the parameter or provided to the method is returned instead.
        Parameters:
        request - The request to find the referer from.
        or - The default referer value.
        Returns:
        The referer of the provided request, or the default value.

      • path

        public static java.io.File path(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                java.lang.String path)
